name: Abi (KaoszElemer)
description:
A short action adventure game, made for the#LOWREZJAM 2022.

Abi is lost! You have to find the key!

Controls:

  • Arrows - movement
  • A - Attack, use
  • Tab - Stats, Info

Try to find the powerups to help on your jurney, such as the SPEED UP, the COMPASS, the HP UP.  While fighting against 6 different enemies you can find some loot for your arsenal too. The SWORD UPGRADE is a very powerful melee weapon or you can attack from afar with a BOW, or a SMG.

 If you found the key and reached the highest possible score you can leave via the exit archway! If you can live alive you get 10000 points as a bonus! Feel free to post your hiscore in the comments!!!

If your hero dies, it dies. There is no running away from your nightmare.

--

This game was made for the #LOWREZJAM 2022, in 2 weeks. The resolution is 64x64, scaled up 10 times.

The code, the music, the sound fx, every sprite, and every animation was made by me during the jam, even the ones i listed below, were recycled to fit into this resolution. A few bugs will emerge here and there, but i am no programmer, this is my second finished game ever, and I've only started programming last year january.
